events.message: I received my new headphones today, but unfortunately one of the ear cups is broken and it makes a cracking noise when I try to use it.
The issue reported by the customer has been categorized under Product Defect due to the broken ear cup and cracking noise problem.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the defective headphone issue and provide assistance.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the problem with your headphones. I’m here to help you get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the broken ear cup and the packaging it arrived in so we can assess the damage properly?
Here are the pictures showing the cracked ear cup and the box it came in. The damage must have happened during shipping.
Thank you for the photos. We can either send you a replacement unit immediately or issue a full refund. Which option would you prefer?
I would prefer a replacement unit instead of a refund, as I really like this model and want to use it without defects.
We have processed your replacement request and you will receive a new set of headphones within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your replacement headphones have arrived and that everything is working perfectly now.
Yes, I received the replacement headphones and they are in perfect condition. Thank you for the prompt support!
We are glad your issue has been resolved to your satisfaction. If you need any further assistance, please contact us again. Closing the case now.
